snippet.title: Triple stack glass-to-glass anodic bonding for optogalvanic spectroscopy cells with electrical feedthroughs
snippet.description: Triple stack glass-to-glass anodic bonding for optogalvanic spectroscopy cells with electrical feedthroughs / Daschner, Renate ; Kübler, Harald ; Löw, Robert ; Baur, Holger ; Frühauf, Norbert ; Pfau, Tilman We demonstrate the use of an anodic bonding technique for building a vacuum tight vapor cell for the use of Rydberg spectroscopy of alkali atoms with thin film electrodes on the inside of the cell. [...] arXiv:1403.1093. \- 2014\. Preprint

snippet.title: MUON DETECTORS: CSC
snippet.description: MUON DETECTORS: CSC / J. Hauser The earliest collision data in 2011 already show that the CSC detector performance is very similar to that seen in 2010. That is discussed in the DPG write-up elsewhere in this Bulletin [...] CMSBUL-ARTICLE-2011-006.- 2011 \- Published in : , no. 1/2011, pp. 9

snippet.title: A microcapillary lens for X-rays
snippet.description: A microcapillary lens for X-rays / Dudchik, Y I ; Kolchevsky, N N A new design of a compound refractive lens for X-rays is proposed. The lens is made as a set of glue microlenses placed in a glass capillary. [...] 1999 \- Published in : Nucl. Instrum. Methods Phys. Res., A 421 (1999) 361-364

snippet.title: LHC tubes near the end of their journey Fin de parcours pour les tubes du LHC
snippet.description:
LHC tubes near the end of their journey Fin de parcours pour les tubes du LHC Production of the heat exchanger tubes, which will cool down the LHC magnets, and of the cold bore tubes, in which the proton beams will circulate, is due to be completed around the end of 2004 [BUL-NA-2004-114]; [25/2004].- Published in CERN Bulletin 25/2004
Detailed record \- Similar records

snippet.title: Photodiode read-out of the ALICE photon spectrometer $PbWO_{4}$ crystals
snippet.description: Photodiode read-out of the ALICE photon spectrometer $PbWO_{4}$ crystals / Man'ko, V I ; Ippolitov, M S ; Sibiryak, Yu ; Volkov, M ; Klovning, A ; Maeland, O A ; Odland, O H ; Rongved, R ; Skaali, B Proposal of abstract for LEB99, Snowmass, Colorado, 20-24 September 1999The PHOton Spectrometer of the ALICE experiment is an electromagnetic calorimeter of high granularity consisting of 17280 lead-tungstate (PWO) crystals of dimensions 22x22x180 mm3, read out by large-area PIN-diodes with very low-noise front-end electronics. The crystal assembly is operated at -25C to increase the PWO light yield. [...] CERN-ALI-99-25; CERN-OPEN-2000-051; CERN-ALICE-PUB-99-25.- Geneva : CERN, 1999 - 5 p. Fulltext: PDF; Published version from CERN: PDF; In : 5th Conference on Electronics for LHC Experiments, Snowmass, CO, USA, 20 - 24 Sep 1999, pp.232-236
